EmailTemplate.subject: Is Your Team Not Collaborating? Here’s Why…
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-drive-collaboration?cmp=EBBSDECEMBERBLOG192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Collaboration.
The Answer To Success! Learn how bringing your employees together can create effective collaboration in the workplace with these simple steps – it’s a great way to increase morale and productivity. Show Me How <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-drive-collaboration?cmp=EBBSDECEMBERBLOG192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Be Inspired. More Great Reads Here. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-ergo-chair.aspx?cmp=EBBSDECEMBERBLOG192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> How to Properly Adjust an Ergonomic Chair <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-ergo-chair.aspx?cmp=EBBSDECEMBERBLOG192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Do you know what to look for in an ergonomic chair? A good ergonomic chair should provide employees with the ability to adjust the height, lumbar support, seat depth and armrests of the chair. For an ergonomic chair to have a positive impact… READ MORE <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-ergo-chair.aspx?cmp=EBBSDECEMBERBLOG192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-open-office-benefits.aspx?cmp=EBBSDECEMBERBLOG192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> How An Open Office Workspace Can Benefit Employees <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-open-office-benefits.aspx?cmp=EBBSDECEMBERBLOG192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
With the millennial generation taking over the workplace, the traditional office design has begun to change. One way this is happening is with the transition to an open office concept. So what is an open office workspace? READ MORE <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-open-office-benefits.aspx?cmp=EBBSDECEMBERBLOG192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-benefits-of-a-docking-station.aspx?cmp=EBBSDECEMBERBLOG192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> 3 Benefits Of A Docking Station <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-benefits-of-a-docking-station.aspx?cmp=EBBSDECEMBERBLOG192EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
For businesses of all sizes, it’s crucial to provide employees with the right tools to help them perform their best work. In 2019, this usually begins with supplying employees with a computer.
